import Mathlib

open Set

variable {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E]

/-- Let U âŠ‚ E (e.g. â„^n) be open and let f : U â†’ â„ be differentiable. If f is convex on U,
    then for all x,y âˆˆ U and t âˆˆ [0,1], f(t â€¢ x + (1 - t) â€¢ y) â‰¤ t f(x) + (1 - t) f(y). -/
theorem convex_on_implies_convex_inequality {U : Set E} {f : E â†’ â„}
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hf : DifferentiableOn â„ f U) (hconv : ConvexOn â„ U f) :
  âˆ€ (x y : E) (t : â„), x âˆˆ U â†’ y âˆˆ U â†’ t âˆˆ Icc (0 : â„) 1 â†’
    f (t â€¢ x + (1 - t) â€¢ y) â‰¤ t * f x + (1 - t) * f y := by sorry
